actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The mechanist makes two Warhammer or Light Crossbow attacks.

actions.name: Warhammer
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 7 (1d8+3) bludgeoning damage, or 8 (1d10+3) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
actions.desc: _Ranged Weapon Attack:_ +3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 5 (1d8+1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Repair (Recharge 4-6)
actions.desc: The mechanist touches one friendly Construct it can see. The target regains 5 (2d4) HP.

special_abilities.name: Tools of the Trade
special_abilities.desc: The mechanist is proficient with tinker tools and doubles its proficiency bonus for any ability check it makes with tinker tools.
